com.cognifide.qa.bb.mapper.field

Class PageObjectListProxyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.mapper.field.PageObjectListProxyProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PageObjectSelectorListProxyProvider

    public class PageObjectListProxyProvider
extends Object
implements FieldProvider
    This class is a provider of Java proxies that will intercept access to PageObject fields that are lists of PageObjects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PageObjectListProxyProvider()

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageObjectListProxyProvider

        public PageObjectListProxyProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • accepts

        public boolean accepts(Field field)
        PageObjectInjectorListener calls this method to check if the provider is able to handle currently injected field.

        PageObjectListProxyProvider handles fields that are:

        • lists of PageObjects,
        • annotated with one of FindBy annotations.
        Specified by:
        accepts in interface FieldProvider
        Parameters:
        field - represents field in page object.
        Returns:
        true if provider is able to handle currently injected field.

      • provideValue

        public Optional<Object> provideValue(Object pageObject,
                                     Field field,
                                     PageObjectContext context)
        Produces a proxy that will provide value for the list of PageObjects. Handler of this proxy is an instance of PageObjectListInvocationHandler.
        Specified by:
        provideValue in interface FieldProvider
        Parameters:
        pageObject - This is the parent object of the injected field.
        field - Provider will generate value for this field.
        context - Provider might refer to frame path and locator factory while generating value for the field.
        Returns:
        Value for the injected field, as calculated by the provider.

      • isList

        protected boolean isList(Field field)

      • shouldCacheResults

        protected boolean shouldCacheResults(Field field)
